metadata.creator: Cory Doctorow
metadata.description: My latest podcast is a reading of the author's note from "Attack Surface" -- the third Little Brother book, which comes out on Oct 12. I recorded this for the audiobook edition of Attack Suface, which I've been recording all last week with Amber Benson and the Cassandra de Cuir from Skyboat Media. If you like what you hear, please consider pre-ordering the book -- it's a scary time to have a book in the production pipeline!
metadata.subject: cory doctorow

metadata.title: Cory Doctorow Podcast 335 Attack Surface Authors Note
